titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Logbook of the Brig Dona Maria Thereza, 1814-1816 MS 571
titlestmt.author: Alan Bath and Lauren Meyers

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-01 23:11:27 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Logbook of the Brig Dona Maria Thereza
did.abstract: The logbook is approximately 130 pages. The first 80 pages are in Portuguese and cover voyages from Fayal in the Azores to Riga and back to Lisbon, with an additional trip from Fayal to St. Petersburg. The remainder is in English and covers a voyage from Boston to Fayal.

physdesc.label: Physical Description
physdesc.extent: The Logbook of the Brig Dona Maria Theresa measures 9" x 15" with canvas sail cloth covers.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: Log records the travels of the Brig Dona Maria Thereza, a Portuguese ship piloted by Sergio Ribeiro.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Approximately 130 pages. The first 80 pages are in Portuguese and cover voyages from Fayal in the Azores to Riga and back to Lisbon, with an additional trip from Fayal to St. Petersburg. The remainder is in English and covers a voyage from Boston to Fayal.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Heritage Auction Galleries, October 2010.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Logbook of the Brig Dona Maria Thereza, MS 571, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Logbook of the Brig Dona Maria Thereza must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Rice University.

did.unittitle: Logbook of the Brig Dona Maria Thereza
